meanings.definition: A person or thing that closely resembles another, especially in appearance.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the twins were mistaken for lookalikes.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity had many lookalikes who imitated her style.
meanings.sent3: The lookalikes at the costume party caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The two cars parked side by side were lookalikes, making it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent5: In the mirror maze, I kept bumping into my lookalikes at every turn.

meanings.sent1: The lookalikes dresses were on sale at the store.
meanings.sent2: The two houses on the street were lookalikes with identical paint colors.
meanings.sent3: The lookalikes flowers in the garden added a touch of symmetry.
meanings.sent4: The lookalikes clouds in the sky seemed to mirror each other.
meanings.sent5: The lookalikes paintings in the gallery were hard to tell apart.
